title: 93/395/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 July 1993 calling upon the Italian Republic to postpone the adoption of its draft regulations in respect of the labelling of foodstuffs and infant formulae packaged under a modified atmosphere (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 July 1993 calling upon the Italian Republic to postpone the adoption of its draft regulations in respect of the labelling of foodstuffs and infant formulae packaged under a modified atmosphere (Only the Italian text is  authentic)
(93/395/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Italian Republic shall, for a period of six months from the notification of this Decision, postpone the adoption of its two draft regulations in respect of labelling rules requiring the inclusion of the words 'packaged under a modified  atmosphere'.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 July 1993.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 33, 8. 2. 1979, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 42, 15. 2. 1991, p. 27.
